pattern.name: notion_to_github_sync
pattern.description: Sync Notion tasks to GitHub issues

steps.step: Detect new or updated tasks in Notion
Create or update corresponding GitHub issues
Map Notion fields to GitHub issue fields

pattern.code: def sync_notion_to_github(notion_task): github_issue = create_github_issue( title=notion_task['title'], body=notion_task['description'], assignee=select_user(notion_task['assignee']) ) update_notion_task(notion_task['id'], github_issue['url'])

pattern.name: github_to_notion_sync
pattern.description: Sync GitHub issue status to Notion

steps.step: Detect status changes in GitHub issues

pattern.code: def sync_github_to_notion(github_issue): notion_task = find_notion_task(github_issue['id']) update_notion_task_status(notion_task['id'], github_issue['state']) sync_comments(notion_task['id'], github_issue['comments'])

pattern.name: automatic_assignment
pattern.description: Assign tasks based on user availability and role

steps.step: Select most suitable user for each task
Assign in both Notion and GitHub
